sentences.en: In fact, the superorganism scenario is in a sense just the cosmic flip side of the diagnosis offered by Carr and other techno-skeptics.
sentences.cn: 事实上，在卡尔和其他科技怀疑论者的诊断里，超个体的假设在某种意义上只不过是宇宙的反面。

sentences.en: Superorganism was a buzz word among biologists in the 1920 s.
sentences.cn: 二十世纪二十年代,超有机体在生物学家眼里可是个时髦词.

trans.tran_cn: 超个体（指群居昆虫等的群体）
